titleStmt.title: The voice of the iron rod, to his Highness the Lord Protector: being a seasonable admonition presented to him, and to all judicious men: by Arise Evans.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 17."; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
